title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 556.3 - Vacuum pumps
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 556.3 - Vacuum pumps

State Regulations

The use of vacuum pumps or other devices for the purpose of
putting a vacuum on any gas or oil-bearing stratum is prohibited. Exceptions to
this ruling may be obtained on an administrative basis, however, from the
department upon application and demonstration of good cause. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
556.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
